snippet: After a delay because of Hurricane Sandy, Les Ballets Jazz de Montréal has brought a highly stylized program to the Joyce Theater.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews performance by Les Ballets Jazz de Montreal at Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: After a delay because of Hurricane Sandy, Les Ballets Jazz de Montréal has brought a highly stylized program to the Joyce Theater.

headline.seo: Les Ballets Jazz de Montréal at the Joyce
headline.main: Keeping It Cool and Familiar, Even When Life Gets Messiest, in Love and War
headline.print_headline: Keeping It Cool and Familiar, Even When Life Gets Messiest, in Love and War
